title: yahoo62278
author: yahoo62278
created_time: July 10, 2022, 12:56:49 PMLast edit: June 07, 2023, 06:11:56 PM by yahoo62278
content: Ultimatearcade.io is a new gaming site that you can earn tokens playing games. Anyone can visit the site and sign up to check it out, but if you PM me and sign up under my code, i'll get you 50 cents to test the game with.(It is not auto withdrawable, you must play with it.) If anyone is familiar with the old snake game, they have their own version.(This game is called cyber worms and the only game I have tested) Brief description belowCyber WormsThis game is where players enter an arena with a small snake that grows with every dot you cross over. You start with around a 100 count snake and can grow up to 10000. What you are trying to do in this game is make someone run into the side of your snake and kill them. Each kill you make earns you money in the game. You can leave the game at anytime and bank your money or you can keep playing to get more kills. WARNING if you make a kill and do not leave but then get killed, you lose the money you made. so it is best to make a kill and exit unless you're extremely good at the game.How to kill players1. Make a player run into the side of your snake2. If you have a bigger snake then your opponent you can run into them head on and winLeaving the gameIf you are playing on a desktop or laptop to leave the game you hold the escape button down for 2 seconds and will leave the game. If you are playing on your mobile device, you will see a button on the left that says leave game, just click it.Using boostWhen you are playing you will notice you can boost your snake making it speed up. Be careful using this as when you are using it, you lose points from your snake growing. Available game modes1. Practice lobby - This lobby is where you can test the game and improve your skill. Free to enter and occasionally there is free money to be won but it is rare.2. 20 cent lobby - This lobby you can win money in and it is against beginners mainly3. $1.50 lobby - This is for the more advanced players to take a chance at winning4. $5 lobby - This is for the big boys who feel they are unbeatable. The game has multiple options for crypto deposits(bitcoin coming soon I hope) There is a $100 max deposit per day limit. Users can pm me with questions and i'll answer the best I can. I'm not the owner so I suggest joining their discord.1st deposit is matched up to $20 I believeTwitter: https://twitter.com/utournamentggInstagram: https://instagram.com/ultimatetournament.ggDiscord: https://discord.gg/tournamentTikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@ultimatetournament.ggTwitch: https://www.twitch.tv/ultimatetournamentggDISCLAIMERI do not own this site, join their discord to get answers to questions you may have regarding gameplay, deposits, or withdrawals.

comments.author: Gianluca95
comments.body: I would like to welcome this platform on bitcointalk.org !@yahoo62278, it would be cool if someone of UltimateArcade team can register here and reply users question that surely will come, instead to join on Discord (maybe someone can't be familiar with it).Wish to you and them good luck !

If possible, is it fine if you sent the code to me through private message without me PMing you? You only need consent right? I'm lazy right now lol. If not possible then I'll pm you later. TIA. I'm wondering if you personally know the owner or marketing staff of the site, do you? Any relation with them? Regardless, welcome to bitcointalk Ultimate Arcade. Goodluck!

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Welcome to Bitcointalk.Snake game that we use to play on Nokia phones. Looks fun and not a luck base game so your skills are going to be tested. So is what the tagline of the arcade "Skills pay, luck doesn't."  This arcade deserve to have an Android app, which we could easily play on than on a desktop. If I find it good to play on android web browser, it should be great.

comments.author: Raflesia
comments.body: I love this snake game with its Arcade game.When I enter Cyber Worms there is always a notification "Skill based contests are not allowed in your state or country at this moment. You can still play in the practice lobby." is my country restricted? but I can still play the game with the $0 option (free) but I can't find any countries in the FAQ that are prohibited.So with verification no, is it mandatory? when you click on deposit you have to verify the number first.

I know a couple people whom have gotten cashouts and so far no red flags have popped off. If that were to change I would cease promoting in this thread. You can still play in the practice lobby." is my country restricted? but I can still play the game with the $0 option (free) but I can't find any countries in the FAQ that are prohibited.So with verification no, is it mandatory? when you click on deposit you have to verify the number first.Indonesia is 1 of the few countries prohibited from using the site for money. You can use a vpn but idk if it would still block you due to your phone number. FYI anyone making an account not under my link gets 0 upon signing up. You have to sign up under me for the 50 cents.I'm online if anyone wants to practice in the free lobby

I would love to try this but in case there will be no player, Is there any bot accounts that we can play with and still earn cents upon killing them? comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Nice to see we are increasing inside the worm games. I think I like it there is the need to go to the beginners room already, I find  only few there yet. It needs a lot of player for snakes to grow its Mass, is there a way to boost Mass to fight the bigger snakes?Retro Chase is still beta I guess, but its also fun to bet there if its already available. I wonder when. And the time out is another to beat.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: bittraffic on July 11, 2022, 03:16:57 AMNice to see we are increasing inside the worm games. I think I like it there is the need to go to the beginners room already, I find  only few there yet. It needs a lot of player for snakes to grow its Mass, is there a way to boost Mass to fight the bigger snakes?Retro Chase is still beta I guess, but its also fun to bet there if its already available. I wonder when. And the time out is another to beat.As I see and try already the game, You can only gain mass by eaiting those food(tiny particles) on the ground because you can not get other players food once you killed them so definitely you don't need other player to increase your size. Other players just give you the cash when you kill them. That is the difference of this games to the typical worm game.I might create again new account under Yahoo code. I didn't notice his terms that I need to use his code to get the 50 cents bonus to play.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Quote from: bittraffic on July 11, 2022, 03:16:57 AMNice to see we are increasing inside the worm games. I think I like it there is the need to go to the beginners room already, I find  only few there yet. It needs a lot of player for snakes to grow its Mass, is there a way to boost Mass to fight the bigger snakes?Retro Chase is still beta I guess, but its also fun to bet there if its already available. I wonder when. And the time out is another to beat.You don't have to have the biggest snake to win. Your goal is to make any size snake run into the side of you. Of course having a bigger snake gives you advantages such as being able to circle your opponent and trap them, but you can beat a max snake with a min snake. You do gain some of your opponents mass when you defeat them as well. I don't know exactly what % but your snake does increase on a kill.

comments.author: Kakmakr
comments.body: Ah... I see why you are doing this OP ....." Refer a friend, get $10 ...On their first deposit, you both get $10! " ....Well Done on innovative thinking.    Something that I picked up in the ToS ===> "All Non-U.S. and Non-E.U. players, can always participate in warm-up free to play tournaments." Also, they require (a) full name; (b) permanent physical residential address and a billing Zip Code in a jurisdiction in which participation in the tournament you select in Ultimate Arcade is unrestricted by law; and (c) credit card or other payment information, which information and/or signing authorization may be verified by Ultimate Tournament (becoming a "Cash Player"). So people that does not qualify to play here, will struggle to bypass all these KYC requirements.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Quote from: Kakmakr on July 11, 2022, 12:00:58 PMAh... I see why you are doing this OP ....." Refer a friend, get $10 ...On their first deposit, you both get $10! " ....Well Done on innovative thinking.    Something that I picked up in the ToS ===> "All Non-U.S. and Non-E.U. players, can always participate in warm-up free to play tournaments." Also, they require (a) full name; (b) permanent physical residential address and a billing Zip Code in a jurisdiction in which participation in the tournament you select in Ultimate Arcade is unrestricted by law; and (c) credit card or other payment information, which information and/or signing authorization may be verified by Ultimate Tournament (becoming a "Cash Player"). So people that does not qualify to play here, will struggle to bypass all these KYC requirements.  Unfortunately KYC is becoming the norm on nearly all casinos. Users may have to pass KYC, that's life. The time of making money without reporting it to your tax man is coming to an end, governments always got their hand out in most countries.
